public static interface StatementBuilder.ExposesUpdatingClause extends StatementBuilder.ExposesDelete, ExposesMerge, StatementBuilder.ExposesSetAndRemove, StatementBuilder.ExposesForeach
A step providing all the supported updating clauses (DELETE, SET)
